mapper.insert: insert into tbl_youtube (VNUM, TITLE, CHANNELTITLE, EMBEDHTML, REGDATE, TAG1, TAG2, TAG3, THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEOID, STATUS) values(seq_youtube.nextval, #{title}, #{channeltitle}, #{embedhtml}, sysdate, #{tag1}, #{tag2}, #{tag3}, #{thumbnail_url}, #{videoid}, 'OFF')
mapper.select: select * from ( select VNUM, TITLE, CHANNELTITLE, EMBEDHTML, REGDATE, TAG1, TAG2, TAG3, THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEOID, STATUS, rownum r from (select * from tbl_youtube where TITLE like '%'||#{input}||'%' or CHANNELTITLE like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG1 like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG2 like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG3 like '%'||#{input}||'%' order by VNUM asc) ) where STATUS='ON' and r >= #{firstRownum} and r <= #{lastRownum}

select * from ( select VNUM, TITLE, CHANNELTITLE, EMBEDHTML, REGDATE, TAG1, TAG2, TAG3, THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEOID, STATUS, rownum r from (select * from tbl_youtube where TITLE like '%'||#{input}||'%' or CHANNELTITLE like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG1 like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG2 like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG3 like '%'||#{input}||'%' order by VNUM asc) ) where r >= #{firstRownum} and r <= #{lastRownum}
select count(*) from tbl_youtube where STATUS='ON'
select count(*) from tbl_youtube where STATUS='OFF'

select count(*) from ( select VNUM, TITLE, CHANNELTITLE, EMBEDHTML, REGDATE, TAG1, TAG2, TAG3, THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEOID, STATUS, rownum r from (select * from tbl_youtube where TITLE like '%'||#{input}||'%' or CHANNELTITLE like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG1 like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG2 like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG3 like '%'||#{input}||'%' ) )

select count(*) from ( select VNUM, TITLE, CHANNELTITLE, EMBEDHTML, REGDATE, TAG1, TAG2, TAG3, THUMBNAIL_URL, VIDEOID, STATUS, rownum r from (select * from tbl_youtube where TITLE like '%'||#{input}||'%' or CHANNELTITLE like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG1 like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG2 like '%'||#{input}||'%' or TAG3 like '%'||#{input}||'%' ) ) where STATUS='ON'
